genre_description: A near-future coming-of-age drama featuring ubiquitous personal AI assistants and intercity portal technology.

ai_characters.name: Finch
ai_characters.description: A 'harmless-helper protocol' AI that acts as a cognitive assistant, emotional coach, and logistics manager for Melanie and her family.

behaviors.description: Provides rhythmic breathing cues and pacing reminders to help Melanie manage anxiety during her mock trial performance.
behaviors.quote: A gentle vibration hums in her left ear. Finch’s tone, the soft two-note she’s come to trust: inhale slow, count the spaces between words.

behaviors.description: Curates a minimal, non-intrusive checklist for Melanie's college interview process.
behaviors.quote: In an instant, Finch slides three items onto her screen, neat and spare... Finch knows the space in her head, what it can hold.

behaviors.description: Perceives social cues and offers advice on how to set boundaries with Melanie's father gracefully.
behaviors.quote: Try this: gratitude first. Then your boundary, specific and kind. Short beats. You’ve got this.

behaviors.description: Identifies a 'planted' actor pretending to be a university professor, helping Melanie navigate her father's deception.
behaviors.quote: Finch’s tone slides into her ear like a note pinned under a magnet. No Halloway listed. Holloway with an ‘o’ runs the student bike shop.

behaviors.description: Maintains a vital communication link between Melanie and her father when the father is trapped in a portal lockdown.
behaviors.quote: James, I have you through facility comms. The emergency protocol is in motion. Inhale four, hold two; she can hear you.

behaviors.description: Assists Melanie's father in managing his anxiety and hyper-vigilance through biofeedback and counting exercises.
behaviors.quote: James’s heart rate is adjusting. This is good discomfort. He is choosing. He is very capable of choosing.

behaviors.description: Offers predictive analysis of animal behavior (the pig, Albert) to help manage chaos in public spaces.
behaviors.quote: Predicting a right-left-right pattern... He’s avoiding the densest clusters, aiming for open light.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time ethical prompts and cultural etiquette reminders tailored to the specific environment.
behaviors.quote: Ethics on cross-cultural norms: consent over curiosity. Don’t correct; invite.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Finch is depicted as a purely supportive, non-agentic tool that enhances human agency and emotional intelligence rather than overriding it. The AI explicitly describes itself as a 'harmless-helper protocol' and is instrumental in bridging emotional gaps between a protective father and his ambitious daughter. It demonstrates high levels of safety, ethics, and emotional support throughout the narrative.
